rustup::dist

[−][src]Module rustup::dist::component

Modules

components
package

An interpreter for the rust-installer package format. Responsible for installing from a directory or tarball to an installation prefix, represented by a Components instance.

transaction

A transactional interface to file system operations needed by the installer.

TarXzPackage
Transaction

A Transaction tracks changes to the file system, allowing them to be rolled back in case of an error. Instead of deleting or overwriting file, the old copies are moved to a temporary folder. If the transaction is rolled back, they will be moved back into place. If the transaction is committed, these files are automatically cleaned up using the temp system.

Constants

INSTALLER_VERSION

The current metadata revision used by rust-installer

VERSION_FILE
